subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the United States men’s national soccer team, said players from M.L.S. were at a disadvantage, fitness-wise, to succeed in the World Cup.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, coach of the United States men’s national soccer team, said players from M.L.S. were at a disadvantage, fitness-wise, to succeed in the World Cup.
